name: Spike bomb 2 (DEMO)
description:
New and better than ever

Spike bomb is the first full original game I released (we are not counting a game about a trash can)... unfortunately, the game was not very good...

This sequel aims to fix as many problems for the original (you know... what sequels should do) and to be a fun game with a good story and fun characters.

With better controls, better graphics, new moves, new music, improved and new characters, this game will try to be the best thing i can make (for now at least)

Have fun and i hope you look forward for the full game!

(I'll most probably be showing a lot of stuff in twitter now so go there for news.)

Also, feedback is appreciated... i will not add a walking button  tho, only dashing .·)
